text: hi, some time ago i saw a press with a "marketers friendly way to update/edit a hubdb"... how is that development, when we can see that on beta?

i currently have clients (marketers) updating HubDB data within the HubSpot UI and haven't heard any complaints. its a pretty straight forward UX IMO. But I am not sure if this is what you are referencing or not.
Same here, havenâ€™t heard any problems from our clients/marketers
I have complaints. For sure. Sorting by column, grouping would be huge ux improvements
Sortying or re ordering is the biggest complaint
